channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- DDI Central
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- DDI Central

item.title: CVE-2024-5471|2024-08-01T21:11:12.767Z -- manageengine -- ddi%20central
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine DDI Central versions 4001 and prior were vulnerable to agent takeover vulnerability due to the hard-coded sensitive keys.

item.title: CVE-2024-27311|2024-07-17T10:52:45.823Z -- manageengine -- ddi%20central
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine DDI Central versions 4001 and prior were vulnerable to directory traversal vulnerability which allows the user to upload new files to the server folder.

item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine DDI Central versions 4001 and prior were vulnerable to agent takeover vulnerability due to the hard-coded sensitive keys.
